headerText: The `v-hover` component provides a clean interface for handling hover states for any component.

usage.desc: The `v-hover` component is a wrapper that should contain only one element, and can trigger an event when hovered over. In order for `v-hover` to work properly, either the `value` prop should be set to `true` or the wrapped element should contain `slot-scope="{ wrapper }"`.

transition.desc: Create highly customized components that respond to user interaction.
